Adult.health: Adult dogs require regular exercise to maintain a healthy weight and prevent obesity. Regular vet check-ups are recommended to monitor for early signs of health issues.

Senior.health: Senior dogs often face mobility issues, arthritis, and dental disease. Provide joint supplements and ensure regular vet visits for pain management and overall health.

Young.health: Young dogs need proper training, socialization, and vaccinations. Ensure a balanced diet for growth and avoid over-exertion, especially in high-energy breeds.
